programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 135
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 134
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud 4a - EP 2
programme.desc: The funniest videos on the internet, guaranteed to Make You Laugh Out Loud. This show celebrates the amazing wealth of talented and funny animals and people to be found on the internet. Featuring the best UGC from around the world, behavioural experts and other comedy talent providing a commentary into the world of LOL.

programme.title: The Noise S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: To succeed in THE NOISE, teams of contestants must complete seemingly easy challenges without making a single sound. Can they pedal a bicycle or unzip a sports bag or open a can of coke while staying completely quiet?

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 15
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 7
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 44
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Steve Carell ("The Morning Show") and Ashley Graham (Ellentube original digital series "Fearless with Ashley Graham").

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is D. Everyone is invited to the Robot Dance Competition so put on your dancing shoes and dance away!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 9
programme.desc: Leo discovers that a satin bowerbird has been stealing blue objects from him and his family. Realising that the satin bowerbird might be lost, the Junior Rangers set out to bring the satin bowerbird back to its bower. A pygmy hippo appears in the garden pond. The Junior Rangers hit the road to send the hippo home, but their journey is delayed by a sticky situation involving quicksand.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 51
programme.desc: Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, in new adventures in Woodland.

programme.title: Kate & Mim-Mim S2 - EP 19
programme.desc: Kate and her stuffed toy friends use their imaginations to go on wild and incredible adventures.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 3
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 4
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Super Wings S4: Super Charge - EP 25
programme.desc: Jett, the adorable little red plane, continues his adventures and missions all around the world!

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Marinette and Adrien are chosen to become Paris superheroes: Ladybug and Cat Noir. They each have a Miraculous, a jewel linked to magical creatures (Kwamis) that give them powers. Their mission is to keep Hawk Moth - who wants to steal their Miraculouses - from wreaking havoc on the town.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians Of The Galaxy Yr 1 - EP 21
programme.desc: It's up to the Guardians to protect the universe from Thanos, Ronan, Loki and other villains!

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots Academy S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: Five young recruits from Cybertron train to be rescue bots at The Rescue Bots Academy on Earth. Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S5 - Possession - EP 2
programme.desc: A grieving Lloyd is possessed by the ghost of Morro - the Master of Wind and Wu's first student. In Lloyd's body, Morro renders the other ninja powerless before stealing Wu's staff. This relic has the power to open the fabric between realms, enabling the powerful Preeminent to enter the NINJAGO world!

programme.title: Big Big Kampung - EP 1
programme.desc: BIG, BIG KAMPUNG! pits young okto viewers in matches that involves supersized kampung games! Pick-Up Sticks the size of bamboo poles! Five-Stones the size of sofa cushions! And mattress-sized eraser challenge! Each week, two teams of four challenge each other in three different games of supersized kampung-styled games. Winning teams will return to face-off until the last team standing emerges victorious to claim the title of Big, Big Kampung Superchampion!

programme.title: Nigella At My Table S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: In her latest series, Nigella Lawson shares the food she cooks for family and friends. Whether offering up her fresh take on familiar classics, or creating new dishes inspired by different cuisines, Nigella ensures that everyday eating is always pleasurable, with a minimum of fuss.

programme.title: In Your Living Room With PCK And Jojo - EP 4
programme.desc: It is Chu Kang's birthday but he can't go out to celebrate his special day. Watch as your mouth waters when actress Michelle Wong teaches us how to make a chocolate cake with just 2 ingredients! Oli DJ Vimala finally finds time to do all the things around the home that she has always wanted to do, but never had time for. Wah Banana makes us laugh at the funny things that happen when a family have to stay together 24-7. Finally take a listen to Inch's song - Mousedeer, shot in her home studio.

programme.title: Survivor 40 - EP 11
programme.desc: For the hit reality show's landmark 40th season, 20 of the winners come back to prove how they fare against those who share the title and show who is the best of the best.

programme.title: Shark - EP 2
programme.desc: A major wildlife series on the sharks of the world with over thirty species filmed, showing how they hunt, intricate social lives, courtship, growing up and the threats they face.

programme.title: Kitchen Whiz S7 - EP 21
programme.desc: Kitchen Whiz is a fast and fabulous kids game show with a focus on the world of food, cooking and food science.

programme.title: Belle & Sebastian - EP 27
programme.desc: When a courageous and wild young boy from the Alps befriends an exceptionally generous dog, that is shunned because of her enormous size, nobody can stop them from exploring every single peak of the valley together! Always on the lookout for adventure, Belle and Sebastian will rush to anybody's rescue, friend or foe, whatever the risk!

programme.title: Tobot S5 Part 2 - EP 25
programme.desc: Tobot is a cartoon series featuring transforming robot toys tasked to fight crime and protect the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Zak Storm S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: When Zak gets swept into the Bermuda Triangle while surfing, he partners with a magical sword that allows him to transform into a swashbuckling, renegade hero to fight off the numerous perils of the unique and diverse Seven Seas within the belly of the Triangle!

programme.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard - EP 37
programme.desc: The new season embarks on a new story with Aichi and Kai returning to take up the helm as the main protagonists. Many beloved characters such as Misaki Tokura, Kamui Katsuragi and Ren Suzugamori appear as well.

programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 26
programme.desc: Maths is all about problem-solving. In this final episode, Joakim and Charlotte face the ultimate problem - getting out of an Escape Room. See how they use Maths to break codes and solve mysteries to finally break free!

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 644
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 9
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Zootopia
programme.desc: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy. With the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba and more.

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Revealing archives and real footages of the meteorological phenomena, witness some of the most deadly natural disasters the planet has ever seen.

programme.title: Terrordactyl (a.k.a. Jurassic Wars)
programme.desc: When ancient flying reptiles attack Los Angeles, it's up to two working-class friends, the unlikeliest of heroes, to save the day.

programme.title: Into The Mirror
programme.desc: An ex-cop, now working as a security guard in a shopping mall, tries to uncover the secret behind a series of mysterious deaths linked to mirrors.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: The Legends learn where the last fragment of the Spear of Destiny is hidden when they track Commander Steel to NASA Headquarters in 1970.

Ian Fang shares his own love story and imparts skills on how to dote on girlfriends! Let's see how the guests from Mars and Venus fight for their stand on this topic! (重)女人可以疼但不能宠，否则会持宠生娇！女人真的被宠就会变坏，变得不可理喻吗？方伟杰在节目中与大家分享自己的情史，同时还传授“宠女友”心得！男女嘉宾为了争“宠”而互相开炮，精彩绝伦；你绝对不能错过！.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 37
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Taijun is shocked when he sees a person who looks exactly like Na-yan. Moments later, Huijing introduces "Daoxi" to the family, to the surprise of everyone at home. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)泰俊在公司看到一个长得跟娜妍一模一样的人，大吃一惊。随后，英淑邀请“道希"到家里吃饭。辉京将“道希"介绍给世珍等人，令大家都吓一跳。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 2
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Shengzhu's brother Shengtai and mother, unbeknownst to Shengzhu, surreptitiously visit the piece of mountain land which Shengzhu's aunt has given to her. They plan to chase the residents of the villagers out from there and start a resort venture. When Zuodou learns about this and finds out that Shengzhu is the landlord, he immediately leaves the mountains and looks for Shengzhu to persuade her to let him continue staying there. Fortuitously, he saves Shengzhu from a masked man trying to kill her. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠的弟弟胜泰与妈妈瞒着胜珠，偷偷跑去看姑姑送给胜珠的山地。他们打算赶走住在山里的村民，以做度假村的投资。当作斗知道这个消息和得知地主是胜珠后，立刻下山去找胜珠商量让他继续居住的事，却凑巧救了差点遭蒙面男人杀害的胜珠。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 59
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Shina stops Jiezi Bee from advertising on television. The imitation scalp masks from YB Cosmetics are sold at cheap prices and garner high sales quantity. Just as Shina basks in the glory of her success, Zhenghan finds evidence of YB Cosmetics stealing Jiezi Bee's product design. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)世娜抢走洁姿Bee的电视购物时段后，仿造的头皮面罩以低价大卖。佳英气馁。正韩找到YB化妆品盗窃洁姿Bee的技术的证据。世娜为了化解危机，计划用绯闻模糊焦点，竟跟记者爆料正韩和贤基都被佳英玩弄。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 60
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Jiaying wants to expose the wrongdoings of Shenghe and Shina when reporters keep pestering her family. Xianji thinks the media will not be too interested with what Jiaying has to say. Zhenghan thus releases a shocking press release that attracts the attention of the media. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)记者们频频骚扰佳英的家人。佳英不满，要贤基召开记者会，说出胜赫和世娜做过的坏事。贤基觉得记者们不会重视佳英的话，跟正韩和佳英商讨后决定发出震撼业界的新闻稿。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans Of The Earth - EP 6
programme.desc: The host and the filming team travel across the world's seven continents to bring close-up scenes of endangered species'survival difficulties to the audience. 主持人和拍摄团队走遍世界七大洲实地取景, 让观众近距离观察濒危物种的生存困境。.

programme.title: 再创世纪 Another Era - EP 3
programme.desc: In an interview, Gaozhe explains what minibonds are but Tiansheng mocks him for creating minibonds. Gaozhe accuses Tiansheng of being the culprit behind the minibonds fallout. Siyu's parents lost their lives in the financial crisis. When Siyu discovers that Gaozhe is the creator of the minibond, she breaks off with him. (PG13-毒品相关内容)高哲接受采访解释迷你债券, 却被贺天生嘲讽是迷债发明者, 高哲指责贺天生是推广迷债的罪魁祸首。思妤的父母也是迷债受害者而自杀。高哲赶到温哥华安慰思妤，但思妤得知高哲发明迷债便与他分手。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: Salam Ramadan Finland - EP 2
programme.desc: The first Muslims in Finland were the Tatars who migrated here in the late 19th and early 20th century. This was followed by decades of generally smaller number of Muslim immigration in Finland, which has risen dramatically in the early 1990s. These new Muslim immigrants soon established their own mosques and societies in various cities of Finland. We will see how Finland helps these Muslim communities integrate into the fabric of the greater Finnish society, especially during the holy mon Salam Ramadan - FINLAND will showcase the unique beauty of Finnish landscape with its exotic fauna and flora, against which we will experience the colorful ethnic cultures of different races and how the local Muslims has integrated and adapted their Islamic cultures into the rich tapestry of Finnish people.Besides sharing the holy month experience with fellow Muslims around the world, Salam Ramadan - FINLAND series also hope to encourage Muslim tourism for future.

Emi dreams for the future, to build her own home and run a small business. Emi hasn't returned home in about 2 years and is very excited to see this new house built from her own earnings.

When Izlan opens the same business and asks Zara to join him, she refuses and so the fight begin. Jenab finally finds out the truth about Izlan's true identity as a playboy.She is furious for being used by him for his many attempts to destroy Aizul and decides to end their relationship.

programme.desc: Angah is annoyed with Along for scolding him when he asks him for some money. Ucu persuades his mother to consider having an early Hari Raya celebration. This causes much protest among the rest of the siblings.

programme.title: Rintihan Hati - EP 2
programme.desc: After the untimely death of Nadira and Zaidi, both Fazli and Fitri are forced to stay with Jamal, their sole guardian. Jamal accepts the two with open arms. However, hisf wife Suzana and daughter Alia have other plans.

programme.title: Vasantham Cafe S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: A theft occurs in the Caf and Bukit Batok Baby & Potong Pasir Papa get a shocking discovery of the culprit!Meanwhile, several exciting games, songs and dance performances await, including a nostalgic Kannadasan mash-up by Mohan and Latha!Stay tuned tonight at 9pm on Vasantham!

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Sirippu 2016 - EP 3
programme.desc: Laugh out loud to comedy scenes from Kollywood films, right here on Vasantham!

programme.title: Kapalothiya Tamizhan
programme.desc: Chidambaram Pillai, a patriotic lawyer, emerges as a revolutionary leader, and he struggles to free his country from the British.

programme.title: Biwi Ho To Aisi
programme.desc: Directed byJ.K. BihariProduced bySuresh BhagatWritten byJ.K. BihariStarringRekha Farooq ShaikhSalman KhanMusic byLaxmikant-PyarelalRelease date 26 August 1988.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 25
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Queen - EP 4
programme.desc: The first season of Queen, comprising 11 episodes, chronicles the life of Shakthi Seshadri from the age of 14 to 40. In the process, she becomes the state topper in school, a celebrated actress and one of the most sought-after politicians in the state.

programme.title: Irandaam Ulaga Porin Kadaisi Gundu
programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the police and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Irandaam Ulaga Porin Kadaisi Gundu
programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the police and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 25
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Vanakkam Singai - EP 17
programme.desc: "Vanakkam Singai" - is an amalgamation of indoor and outdoor segments within one programme to cater to general audience of multiple age groups. Making the transition from radio's weekday morning belt to television, "Vanakkam Singai" is a 1-hour Breakfast show that aims to kick start Sundays morning with a smile. The segments will comprise of quick breakfast demonstrations , lifestyle & wellness, light-hearted discussion topics that all households can relate to.

programme.title: Avvai Shanmugi
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Pandian, a divorced husband desperately misses his daughter. In order to be with her, he takes up a job in his father-in-law's house. The only catch is that the job is that of a governess.

programme.title: Kala Shah Kala
programme.desc: Lovely, a dark-complexioned man, gets married to Pammi, a beautiful girl. However, his bliss is short-lived as Pammi appears to be possessed by a spirit.

programme.title: Moondram Pirai
programme.desc: Cheenu, a school teacher, falls in love with Bhagyalakshmi, a young woman who regresses to childhood after suffering a head injury in a car crash.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 26
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Rhythm
programme.desc: A single mother changes her opinion about getting married again after meeting a single man and discovering that both of them have a similar past concerning their spouses.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 26
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Siruvargal Naangal - EP 11
programme.desc: Kids United on Siruvargal Naangal only on Vasantham!

programme.title: Arokiam Aarambam- Get Fit With Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 6
programme.desc: Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe Oli 96.8 - EP 10
programme.desc: Catch your Favourite Oli 96.8 DJs, Ravi G & Haleema Live from the Radio Conty.

programme.title: Thiru Valluvan Sr 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Vasantham brings to you a family drama with obvious shades of grey,leaps of fun and emotions.

programme.title: Mayangukiral Oru Madhu
programme.desc: Mayangukiral Oru Maadhu (transl.A woman falls in love) is a 1975 Indian Tamil language film directed by S. P. Muthuraman and produced by S. Baskar. The film stars R. Muthuraman, Sujatha, Thengai Srinivasan and Vijayakumar in lead roles.

programme.title: Super Samayal 4 - EP 12
programme.desc: Going back to our roots, Chef Ariffin and Malene teach us how to make a healthy dish using sun berry leaves in this episode of Super Samayal.

programme.title: Arokiam Aarambam- Get Fit With Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 6
programme.desc: Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.title: Velunatchi - EP 64
programme.desc: Velunachi, a young village girl decides to carry her father's lineage in Tamil martial art form, Silambam.

programme.title: Raama Seetha - EP 0462&0463
programme.desc: 'Raama Seetha' is a heart touching story that revolves around two protagonists - Vasudhev and Meenakshi with completely different mindset.

programme.title: Tamil.com - EP 0015&0016
programme.desc: Tamil.com.

programme.title: Anjaraipetti Sr 7 - EP 29
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the foodies into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings a new flavour to their kitchen, different from the ones they are used to.

programme.title: Uravugal Sangamam - EP 80
programme.desc: The story revolves around the three families, bound by love, hate, care, jealousy and how they eventually conquer it all together.

programme.title: Kudumbam United (HD) - EP 2
programme.desc: Kudumbam United takes a humorous look at the life of a seemingly ordinary Indian family. Each episode will deal with a central theme of bonding and togetherness and the characters are a reflection of the people that we see in our daily lives.

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 27
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Kaadhal Galatta - EP 5
programme.desc: An admirer secretly visits Rekha's boutique but will she notice him? Ravindran is also getting stressed as he still has not found a groom for his first daughter.

programme.title: Galatta 360 - Talkshow - EP 4
programme.desc: Galatta 360 is a brand new talkshow series that aims to educate, entertain, and mostimportantly, chase away those Monday blues! It will connect with viewers not only throughtraditional broadcast platforms, but also through digital media, particularly on social mediaplatforms. Galatta 360 is a highly engaging format will include audience interaction throughnew and refreshing ways.

programme.title: YAAR 3 - EP 38
programme.desc: Mano is held captive in an abandoned apartment by Jana and Nila. She breaks down the past events for him. Mano's biggest mistake, that he was hiding from everyone else so painstakingly, is revealed by Nila. The question on how they were all linked is finally crystal clear. Will Mano be spared?

programme.title: Thalli Pogathey - EP 1
programme.desc: Samar and Ramya are star-crossed lovers. After a year of courting, Samar finally decides to pop the question. Will Ramya accept his proposal or no?

programme.title: Maalai Maathurum - EP 43
programme.desc: A compilation of yesteryear programmes, only on Vasantham!

programme.title: Jonathan Paredes
programme.desc: Leading up to the 2016 Cliff Diving World Series, diver Jonathan Paredes returns to where his career started. In the lead up to the 2016 Cliff Diving World Series, diver Jonathan Paredes returns to his hometown in Mexico to visit the people and places that helped shape his life and career. From the cliffs of Acapulco to the world stage, this is his story.

programme.title: Tough times on Toro
programme.desc: The team starts to feel the exhaustion and Max faces health issues mid-climb on Cerro El Toro. After climbing seven mountains in a row, the team starts to feel the exhaustion and Max faces health issues mid-climb on Cerro El Toro.

programme.title: Made it to Marmolejo
programme.desc: After more than 55 days of expedition, Max and the team face Marmolejo in Chile. After more than 55 days of expedition, Max and the team face Marmolejo in Chile. Sheer exhaustion starts to bring some of the team to a breaking point.

programme.title: Red Bull Skateboarding Presents: You Good?
programme.desc: Zion Wright, Jamie Foy and Alex Midler hit the road to find some of the best skate spots in the world. Zion Wright , Jamie Foy and Alex Midler hit the road to find some of the best skate spots in the world. The three travel together to film and drop some of the heaviest skate action of their careers.

programme.title: Marion Haerty
programme.desc: Marion Haerty’s driving force is progression: to become better, faster and stronger. Marion Haerty’s boardercross and slopestyle technique got her a spot on the Freeride World Tour and led to her first podium finishes. But this wasn’t enough for her. Haerty’s driving force is progression: to become better, faster and stronger.

programme.title: Markus Eder
programme.desc: Markus Eder has the ability to make everything look easy – but does it all come that easy, really? From hitting rails in the park to throwing a butter off a cliff on the mighty Bec des Rosses, Markus Eder has the ability to make everything look easy – but does it all come that easy, really?

programme.title: Ode to Muir: The High Sierra
programme.sub-title: A journey into a great American wilderness
programme.desc: Snowboarders Jeremy Jones and Elena Hight embark on an expedition into California's John Muir Wilderness. Snowboarders Jeremy Jones and Elena Hight embark on an expedition into California's John Muir Wilderness. Their journey balances the challenges of winter with what it means to explore such a vast natural environment.

programme.title: The Call to Adventure
programme.desc: Darryl 'Snake Eyez' Lewis talks about growing up, winning tournaments, and his favourite game character. Darryl 'Snake Eyez' Lewis talks about growing up in Compton, California, USA, winning the world's biggest tournament, and why he loves the Street Fighter IV character Zangief so much.

programme.title: Crossing the Threshold

If it's this hard on land and in town, will Michaocan's rivers prove to be too much to take?

programme.title: Bring A Rope
programme.desc: The Rio Cajones lives up to its name as the guys ride rapids and rappel rock walls in the canyon for two days. The kayaking adventure of a lifetime continues. After an aerial scout, the guys realize they must rappel down a sheer canyon wall because the waterfall is just too dangerous to go over. But at the bottom of the rope they find their best run yet.

programme.title: Quito
